core.players

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.players.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AIPlayer

    public class Player
extends Object
    Represents a participant in the poker game, managing their state, hand of cards, chip count, and betting actions.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Game game
      Reference to the game instance this player is part of.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(String name, int initialChips, Game game)
      Constructs a new player with a given name, initial chip count, and game context.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bet(int amount)
      Places a bet for the player, deducting the amount from their chips and adding it to the game's pot.
      void call()
      Matches the current highest bet in the game, if possible.
      void check()
      Checks (passes) if the player does not wish to increase the bet.
      void fold()
      Folds the player's hand, marking them as inactive for the remainder of the round.
      int getBetAmount()
      Retrieves the total amount the player has bet in the current round.
      int getChips()
      Retrieves the number of chips the player currently has.
      ArrayList<Card> getHand()
      Retrieves the player's current hand of cards.
      String getName()
      Retrieves the player's display name.
      boolean isFolded()
      Indicates whether the player has folded in this round.
      void reset()
      Resets the player's state for a new game round.
      void setChips(int chips)
      Updates the player's chip count directly.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • game

        protected Game game
        Reference to the game instance this player is part of.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(String name,
              int initialChips,
              Game game)
        Constructs a new player with a given name, initial chip count, and game context.
        Parameters:
        name - the player's display name
        initialChips - the starting number of chips for the player
        game - reference to the current Game instance

    • Method Detail

      • fold

        public void fold()
        Folds the player's hand, marking them as inactive for the remainder of the round. Prints a message indicating the fold action.

      • bet

        public void bet(int amount)
        Places a bet for the player, deducting the amount from their chips and adding it to the game's pot. Bets up to the player's available chips.
        Parameters:
        amount - the desired bet amount

      • call

        public void call()
        Matches the current highest bet in the game, if possible. Calculates the difference and places the required chips as a bet.

      • check

        public void check()
        Checks (passes) if the player does not wish to increase the bet. Prints a message indicating the check action.

      • getHand

        public ArrayList<Card> getHand()
        Retrieves the player's current hand of cards.
        Returns:
        list of cards in the player's hand

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Retrieves the player's display name.
        Returns:
        the name of the player

      • getChips

        public int getChips()
        Retrieves the number of chips the player currently has.
        Returns:
        current chip count

      • isFolded

        public boolean isFolded()
        Indicates whether the player has folded in this round.
        Returns:
        true if the player has folded, false otherwise

      • getBetAmount

        public int getBetAmount()
        Retrieves the total amount the player has bet in the current round.
        Returns:
        current bet amount

      • setChips

        public void setChips(int chips)
        Updates the player's chip count directly.
        Parameters:
        chips - the new chip count to set

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the player's state for a new game round. If the player is out of chips, resets them to 1000. Clears the hand, resets folded status and bet amount.
